articles.title: Countries are sitting on millions of J&J vaccine doses, report says - Business Insider
articles.description: Millions of doses are on hold worldwide because they were manufactured during the time of the contamination in February, according to the NYT.
articles.content:
Millions of doses of the Johnson & Johnson vaccine are sitting unused across three continents as national regulators assess their safety, The New York Times has reported.
